com.fishsemi.sdk.aircontrol

Class AirController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fishsemi.sdk.aircontrol.AirController

  • public class AirController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class will bind to air control service to provides control channel. It's the base class for other classes to work correctly.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AirController(android.content.Context context, AirControlListener listener)
      The constructor of AirController

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getUartCount()
      This method returns the count of Uart ports in air board.
      int getVideoStreamCount()
      This method returns the count of video streams in air board.
      void start()
      This method will bind to air control service and then other methods can be called to get information or start request.
      void stop()
      This method will unbind to air control service to free the connection.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AirController

        public AirController(android.content.Context context,
                     AirControlListener listener)
        The constructor of AirController
        Parameters:
        context - the context of the application or activity
        listener - the listener to receive information

    • Method Detail

      • getUartCount

        public int getUartCount()
        This method returns the count of Uart ports in air board.
        Returns:
        the count of Uart ports in air board.

      • getVideoStreamCount

        public int getVideoStreamCount()
        This method returns the count of video streams in air board.
        Returns:
        the count of video streams in air board.

      • start

        public void start()
        This method will bind to air control service and then other methods can be called to get information or start request.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        This method will unbind to air control service to free the connection. It should be called when the AirController is no more needed.
